Which of the following were the officers who were in charge of the administration in each sarkar of Sher Shah Suri?
1. Chief Shiqdar
2. Chief Munsif
3. Amil
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: In the administration of Sher Shah Suri the Chief Shiqdar of the officer for law and order; and the Chief Munsif (judge) were the two officers in charge of the administration in each sarkar.
